## Config Info

**Name:** my-config.yaml

**Theme:** (gaming, streaming, memes, work, etc.)

**Description:** Brief description of this config

**Keys Used:** (e.g., F1-F12, numpad, ctrl+keys)

## Preview
```yaml
# Paste a snippet of your config

  - key: "F1"
    sound: "..."
    description: "..."
```
